lead_paragraph: Dr. Nancy L. Stanwood of Physicians for Reproductive Health writes that “for a political body to mandate that doctors provide advice contrary to evidence-based practice, to ethics and to their consciences is abhorrent.”
snippet: Dr. Nancy L. Stanwood of Physicians for Reproductive Health writes that “for a political body to mandate that doctors provide advice contrary to evidence-based practice, to ethics and to their consciences is abhorrent.”
